title: Mark Hughes: Why McLaren team orders brought painful F1 flashback for Coulthard
summary: In a race where McLaren colluded with Williams against Ferrari, David Coulthard was ordered to move over for team-mate Mika Häkkinen — a raw wound reopened three decades on by Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris's Monza switch

qa_pairs.question: Which McLaren driver was ordered to let his teammate pass during a race against Ferrari?
In which race did McLaren employ team orders that were reminiscent of past strategies against Ferrari?
Who were the two McLaren drivers involved in the recent team order incident at Monza?
